title: Help me please...
content:
I know this is simple, but I don’t have a clue, thanks in advance...

 [‹ Sample texts for Cyrillic character set](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012145037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43325 "Go to previous forum topic") [Design and type conventions ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012145037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43346 "Go to next forum topic")
author: synergia

comments.content: This one is easy: you forget to put your vague title in all caps, and vague threads go in the topic-specific forums, not General Discussions. Everyone knows that General Discussions is for design critiques and font ID requests.
